title: Please make it easier to use and fix problems
creator: Brian.C.Harris
content: Thunderbird is so difficult to use. Please improve. I don't know how many users only continue with Thunderbird because they agree with your philosophy. Maybe a lot. I am always fight to make it work. You have to a geek to made perform in an easy way.
